page.title: 03Playground games for girls
page.content:
Four ten year old girls wrote a list of playground games on a big piece of paper.We chose forty games and went to the 1st year girls.We asked for six girls to interview.We asked them which four games they would like to choose from the list.We went to other classes and did the same again and discovered that the most popular playground games were: { {1.LEAP FROG 2.BULLDOG 3.BOYS AFTER {GIRLS 4.STUCK IN THE MUD. }
These are traditional games,people played them many years ago.Our teachers remember them and they are very old!
